Name: Azure Administer WebJob
Description: Start, Stop, or Delete a WebJob from the Azure Web App
Author: dustinchilson

Parameters.Name: WebJobWebApp
Parameters.Label: Web App
Parameters.HelpText: The Web App the Azure WebJob is hosted under.

Parameters.Name: WebJobUserName
Parameters.Label: User Name
Parameters.HelpText:
The Username of the authentication to the Kudu Api.

See https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/Deployment-credentials

Parameters.Name: WebJobPassword
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText:
The Password of the authentication to the Kudu Api.

See https://github.com/projectkudu/kudu/wiki/Deployment-credentials

Parameters.Name: WebJobAction
Parameters.Label: Action
Parameters.HelpText: The action to perform. Start, Stop, or Delete.

Parameters.Name: WebJobType
Parameters.Label: Job Type
Parameters.HelpText: The type of job, Continuous or Triggered

Parameters.Name: WebJobName
Parameters.Label: Job Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the Job to act upon.
